51 
OWL 2 
Inverse Properties 
 
Each object property may have a corresponding inverse property. 
If some property links individual a to individual b, then its invers property ling individual 
b to individual a. 
Creating inverse properties in the pizza example: isIngredientOf.
speaker: SYSTEM
